thread.title: IPO of Volkswagen truck unit planned for first quarter 2019: sources

title: IPO of Volkswagen truck unit planned for first quarter 2019: sources
text:
April 11, 2018 / 5:11 PM / in an hour IPO of Volkswagen truck unit planned for first quarter 2019: sources Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MUNICH (Reuters) - Volkswagen ( VOWG.DE ) is aiming to list its trucks and buses division in the first quarter of next year, two people with knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday. FILE PHOTO: A VW sign is seen outside a Volkswagen dealership in London, Britain November 5, 2015. REUTERS/Suzanne Plunkett/File Photo 
The companyâ€™s headquarters would move to Munich from Braunschweig, the sources said on condition of anonymity. Job guarantees would remain in place, they added. 
A spokesman for the unit said that no decisions had been made and that all options were on the table. Reporting by Irene Preisinger and Andreas Cremer; Writing by Tom Sims, editing by David Evans
